name: Fabulous cookings
description:
Fabulous recipes gathered by the Bogsten family

(1) Ed's pancakes

7 oz wheat flour
1 packet of baking powder
2 oz powdered sugar
2 eggs
1 quart of milk
2 oz butter

(2) Parmigiana alle Melanzane

Tomato sauce
Basil, garlic
Extra virgin olive oil
Mozzarella, Parmesan aged
Eggplant

(3) Mushroom soup

Fresh Bogsten mushrooms
2 pints snake broth
3.5 fl oz cream
Herbs to taste

(4) Onde-onde

4 oz rice flour
2 oz tapioca flour
1.5 oz sugar
2.5 fl oz pandan leaf extract
1 piece palm sugar, chopped fine
Shredded coconut, dried

(5) Rabbit stew
1 rabbit, cut into pieces
1 potato, cubed
1 turnip, cubed
2 carrots, sliced
2 parsnips, sliced
 5 oz Bogsten or portobello mushrooms
4 cloves garlic, crushed
4 fl oz wine
Water to cover
Salt
Pepper
1 tsp beef base
0.5 cup rosemary, finely chopped
0.5 cup thyme, finely chopped
Cook slowly, add starch at end to thicken

name: Fabulous cookings (copy)
description: This appears to be a perfect copy of the Fabulous cookings cookbook, only lacking the strange writings at the end.
